[FTPit](https://www.ftpit.com) is having a special deal for the month of May based on popular request! This month we are offering a 25 percent deal on our 1 GB RAM and 2 GB RAM OpenVZ VPS Servers. Each order now link includes the promo code, and will be applied on the final checkout page.

---

## VPS Offer 1

**OpenVZ VPS - Enterprise HDD - 1GB RAM $2.99/Monthly**  
Coupon Code : **X7ZQ1E4JX2**

* 4 CPU Cores
* 1 GB RAM
* 50 GB Storage
* 2 TB Bandwidth
* 100 Mbit/s
* 1 IPv4
* OpenVZ & SolusVM

**[Order Now](https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=199&promocode=X7ZQ1E4JX2&billingcycle=monthly)**

**OpenVZ HDD Locations**: Atlanta, Dallas, Freemont, Los Angeles, Montreal

---
